Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: The only thing I didn t like was the service at the hotels restaurant On Sunday morning at the breakfast we didn t get any attention from staff which is not normal for the hotel of this level When we were leaving we decided to have a drink before going to the airport so we didn t have much time We waited for 15 min and it turned out that they forgot about our order Restaurant is the weak point
Positive_Review: I loved the attention from staff The service is just perfect I would like to thank concierges Bruno Federico they truly made us feel at home With my husband we travelled to Milan to celebrate our wedding anniversary and in the first evening we found the cake champagne and the bathroom with rose petals it was really attentive from the hotel In Milan I felt badly after my flight and Bruno called to local doctor After that he perfectly organized everything from dinner to cigars that made our stay perfect Grazie Bruno The room and the bathroom were very good to with balcony and the view The breakfast was also good with variety of hot dishes fresh fruit and cheese

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Staff were lovely and very welcoming My favorite concierge ever Bruno he was very professional polite and helpful

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: A bit overpriced especially the food
Positive_Review: Fantastic amiable and willing staff Quality is everywhere Impeccable service The gardens of the property and the grandeur of the space right in the center of the heart of Milan make this experience an amazing one

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: We stayed here for my sister s bridal shower in June We have booked treatments at the Grand Spa and arranged a bridal brunch at their Winter Garden The staff was very accomodating and made sure we had everything we needed and more

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Everything about the hotel and area It was our 25th wedding anniversary and when we arrived to our beautiful corner suite cake and champagne were waiting

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Every aspect of our stay was wonderful the breakfasts in quality and presentation out of a fairytale We also had an amazing dinner in their restaurant The overall ambiance of Palazzo Parigi was lovely every area beautifully tastefully decorated The staff was cordial smiling solicitous friendly exceptional service We felt very comfortable during our stay very good location

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: What a wonderful little escape for me The hotel is amazing Staff is as well in tune to guests needs and comfort I can t wait to get back and be held captive by that delicious bed again

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: The staff were absolutely fantastic Going the extra mile for every request whether it be off menu room service delivery concierge services such as the booking of train and opera tickets and general helpfulness The service and politeness of the staff really stood a foot above the rest

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: The room is spacious and delicately decorated And as we are in our honeymoon the hotel provided us lovely strawberry chocolate dip and champagne The service here is qualified for a 5 star hotel and will definitely come back again

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: If we have more pilows or cushions would be perfect Also would be nice to have tea and coffee facilities in the room
Positive_Review: Fantastic location frendly staff great bar

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: Didn t like that breakfast wasn t included in the cost
Positive_Review: Our beautiful room was on the 7th floor with a lovely balcony and view The blackout button is tremendous shutters come down and provide soundproofing along with being pitch black at any time of day The cocktails are expensive but they fed us the whole time we drank so that evens it out plus they look and taste amazing

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Looks exactly like the pictures online beautiful hotel The customer service was absolutely amazing Reception staff specially I stayed for two nights and didn t realise during the cleaning my concealer had broken To my surprise while I went for a swim the staff had went out to buy exactly the same product amazing

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Everything especially the brilliant suggestions and help on where to eat which we would never have found or known about on our own Also being able to eat delicious food in the hotel in the evenings We loved it all THANK YOU

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: For the price we paid per night it would have been nice if breakfast was included in the room rate
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is excellent Walking distance from all the major attractions and shopping district

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: No tea or coffee making facilities in the room Buffet breakfast also limited hot drinks 1 cup for 25 and 2 cup for 40 This limiting approach was stingy and inhospitable
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed elegant and calm decor

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: No coffee machine in the room
Positive_Review: So peaceful so serene such a courteous staff didn t want to leave Basically a breath taking hotel which we hope to visit many times Simply perfect

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Wonderful everything The staff super helpful with great attitude The food is great Everything is new and shiny Beautiful classic modern hotel with wonderful spa that all guests can use from 9 to 21 Calm green nabourghood where everything is close Cannot think of any minuses

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: Only nitpick is the lack of ability to make own tea in room
Positive_Review: Most comfortable bed ever Staff were consistently wonderful English was second nature to them The facility itself was incredibly tasteful and modern whilst retaining a sense of the history of the building

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: the room temperatures are a little cold for that time everything else was fantastic
Positive_Review: the comfort of everything in the room including the bathroom Loved the food we think it is wonderful

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Hotel is new and the rooms bathrooms are amazing Staff is very friendly Breakfast area is amazing Quite Hotel with a good location 1 km from Doumo

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: I just got back from the hotel I still cant find my Lanvin dress I hope they will find it and update with me soon
Positive_Review: I love bellini cocktails there The bed is very comfortable Classic atmosphere Love it there

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: Food is very expensive for what it is 15 euros for a clear soup and can be hit and miss It was better last time I stayed
Positive_Review: Staff room pool all fantastic Rooms and bathrooms are so spacious and nice Beautiful lobby

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: The wi fi comes and goes if ur not constantly using it Which means u need to log in everytime it disconnects
Positive_Review: The property in general is beautiful and the staff were excellent and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: very friendly and helpful staff We even got a room upgrade as they did not have 2 single beds in the classic one food was excellent My dog had a very nice bed I have never seen that anywhere before Outstanding service exquisite place which I can only recommend

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: During this visit pool was closed and we usually use hotel pools daily for exercise
Positive_Review: Everything Amazing staff Quiet central location great food comfortable beds beautiful pool

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: The quality of the breakfast is not great
Positive_Review: The staff at the reception was great The quality of the hotel is great nice pool and great room off a high standard

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Quite big rooms wonderful Disgin helpful and Lovely stuff this is my forth visit to this hotel and surely won t be the last Simply I love it

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Very comfortable Excellent bathroom Excellent breakfast area with garden setting Hard not to be happy here Shops nearby Not in the centre but better that way

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel excellent service excellent staff excellent location excellent building and furniture I would recommend it for all of my family and friends It s been a great pleasure and amazing experience It s worth ever single euro paid and more

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: First of All it was great Stay at your Hotel Particularly your Housekeeping staff was tooooo good and your ground staff at Main door very helpful Front office staff struggling with English but never the less they did not fall short i wish you all the best and promise next visit Milan in January we will love to stay in your hotel good luck and all the best Regards Capt Arshad Ahmed

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: The breakfast was the most expencive I ever had 40 euros per person I think in hotel on this price cathegory the breakfast should be included for a room
Positive_Review: The hotel was perfect So clean and great service Big points for great pool area and sauna The staff was amazing very helpful kind and they fulfilled all our wishes in a second

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: I thought breakfast was included on rate but it wasn t and I thought it was very expensive although very good but still a little too expensive
Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly rooms were incredibly clean and beautiful Nice area the hotel is lovely 10 minute walk from center We had two small terraces and it was very nice to sit outside The garden of the hotel was also very nice

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: I have been to Milan multiple times staying at other 5 star hotels and this was my first time at the Palazzo Parigi Great breakfast selection and charming winter garden definitely recommend breakfast downstairs Large spacious rooms in light colors and great finishing giving a charming comfortable feel would definitely recommend the hotel for long stays couples shoppers families business travelers Very welcoming staff throughout the hotel breakfast dinner room service reception concierge and porter and attention to detail is unparalleled Walking distance to Via Monte Napoleone and Via Della Spiga Duomo and Galleria Vittorio Emanuelle are a short stroll away Stay was impeccable and would definitely recommend the hotel Great value for your money

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: Free wi fi too slow Rooms lack character
Positive_Review: Excellent location quiet and peaceful yet close enough to all the action Nice winter garden breakfast area facing the yard Comfortable rooms with small balcony and city views

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: The hotel restaurant is very pricey Continental breakfast was 100 00 for 4 On the bar menu hamberger for 30 00 it s a bit too much It s lovely to have a glass of wine or Prosecco in the bar or amazingly beautiful patio which i highly recommend but the price will be high
Positive_Review: This hotel is absolutely beautiful The location can t be beat Our rooms were very clean lovely extremely comfortable beds modern beautiful bathrooms I can t say enough about the concierge s service They helped us navigate the city Went out of their way to print anything we asked for Took their time to help us map our days always with a smile and enthusiam We had a wonderful time in Milan and the Palazzo Parigi most definetely made it extra special We will return

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: 1 A receptionist not precious in returning back with information I asked the receptionist when we were at the room who did our check in and came up and showed us our room if Breakfast is included with the booking or not because I could not remember He mentioned that he will call us from the reception after he check the booking and let me know but he never did come back to us We had to find out this information next day when we were at breakfast 2 Wi Fi strong however it disconnects too often
Positive_Review: Very Luxurious Location is quiet and within a walking distance from the shopping area the Galaria and the Duomo Breakfast area is magnificent however limited choices of food Very Comfortable bed Very clean room and hotel outstanding bathroom with hi tic toilet and a great wide diameter shower fall great new furniture excellent concierge services with precise information

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: The staff are very helpful and cheerful the rooms are very nicely furnished and good size the location close to all the shopping areas and the cathedral

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Positive_Review: We stayed in the classic room and it is fantastic The hotel is quite new the SPA just have opened and the concierge and team is outstanding

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: no coffee machine in the room about 10 euros surcharge for a taxi
Positive_Review: perfect location in the heart of Brera fashion district beautiful standard room big bright with balcony huge bathroom Clarins products in the bathroom free wifi working perfectly free access to the beautiful spa where very good quality tea apples and dry fruits are complimentary lovely personnel always trying to help you really good bed and pillows

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: Staff is nice though would appreciate a little more care when making up the room such as replacing the water and glasses We were left several times with just one glass or no water Some staff at the bar and restaurant should be further trained for more professionalism
Positive_Review: Nice interior colors and quiet position Not crowded

Hotel_Name: Palazzo Parigi Hotel Grand Spa Milano
Negative_Review: The limited food selection in the menu at the restaurant and somewhat high prices for certain dishes
Positive_Review: The positive attitude friendliness and good attention to details of the staff and the general management of the hotel
